name: Tempo Tapper
description:
Tap to the beat to defeat enemies as you make your way to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame!  See how many notes you can hit consecutively to prove your legendary status.

  • Three distinct levels that are based off of iconic rock albums
  • Every level has its own unique track and enemy type
  • Three musical instruments available to play with
  • Each instrument has its own special ability 
  • Five beautifully animated character models
